roleset.name: instability in airflow, bumpy, roiling, rough
roleset.note: TURBULENCE-N NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. (from turbulence.01-n)
TURBULENT-J NOTES: Added automatically by Julia. (from turbulent.01-j)

example.text: The turbulence of classical fluids is an everyday phenomenon, which can be readily observed in the flow of a stream or river.

example.name: turbulent-j
example.text: it is most likely that the boundary layer was turbulent right from the leading edge in these calculations.
